</MembersIndexItem>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/assumptioncachetracker/functioncallbackvh">FunctionCallbackVH</a></>}>
A callback value handle applied to function objects, which we use to delete our cache of intrinsics for a function when it is deleted. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/assumptioncachetracker/functioncallbackvh/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// A cache of \\@llvm.assume calls within a function.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This cache provides fast lookup of assumptions within a function by caching</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// them and amortizing the cost of scanning for them across all queries. Passes</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// that create new assumptions are required to call registerAssumption() to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// register any new \\@llvm.assume calls that they create. Deletions of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\@llvm.assume calls do not require special handling.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/assumptioncache"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/assumptioncache/#ab6a2d92539d4596ba55f6d953ec7c188">AssumptionCache</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This cache is designed to be self-updating and so it should never be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// invalidated.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/assumptioncache/#a4867ed1b6dfd356558bd881567602049"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/assumptioncache/#a4867ed1b6dfd356558bd881567602049">invalidate</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &amp;, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/preservedanalyses">PreservedAnalyses</a> &amp;,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlight">                  FunctionAnalysisManager::Invalidator &amp;) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Add an \\@llvm.assume intrinsic to this function&#39;s cache.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// The call passed in must be an instruction within this function and must</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// not already be in the cache.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/assumptioncache/#a23187618f079555e127ba0e7b4581530">registerAssumption</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/assumeinst">AssumeInst</a> &#42;CI);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Remove an \\@llvm.assume intrinsic from this function&#39;s cache if it has</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// been added to the cache earlier.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/assumptioncache/#a8137607e298da393c72cfcffb2edc352">unregisterAssumption</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/assumeinst">AssumeInst</a> &#42;CI);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Update the cache of values being affected by this assumption (i.e.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// the values about which this assumption provides information).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/assumptioncache/#a5fa8956db34e5076680cfd8398d090dc">updateAffectedValues</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/assumeinst">AssumeInst</a> &#42;CI);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Clear the cache of \\@llvm.assume intrinsics for a function.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// It will be re-scanned the next time it is requested.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/assumptioncache/#a2f5aab0e9687dd8250c8fa49d4de1b1b"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/assumptioncache/#a2f5aab0e9687dd8250c8fa49d4de1b1b">clear</a>() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlight">    AssumeHandles.clear();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlight">    AffectedValues.clear();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Scanned = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Access the list of assumption handles currently tracked for this</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// function.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Note that these produce weak handles that may be null. The caller must</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// handle that case.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// FIXME: We should replace this with pointee&#95;iterator&lt;filter&#95;iterator&lt;...&gt;&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// when we can write that to filter out the null values. Then caller code</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// will become simpler.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/assumptioncache/#a6bc4a01d7ae02545172aaee110d4a01c"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mutablearrayref">MutableArrayRef&lt;ResultElem&gt;</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/assumptioncache/#a6bc4a01d7ae02545172aaee110d4a01c">assumptions</a>() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Scanned)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlight">      scanFunction();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> AssumeHandles;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Access the list of assumptions which affect this value.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/assumptioncache/#ab711f68db26cb29c8332ac93c0bebed1"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mutablearrayref">MutableArrayRef&lt;ResultElem&gt;</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/assumptioncache/#ab711f68db26cb29c8332ac93c0bebed1">assumptionsFor</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;V) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Scanned)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlight">      scanFunction();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> AVI = AffectedValues.find&#95;as(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const&#95;cast&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">&gt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(V));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (AVI == AffectedValues.end())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a99416758c13252bef45320a6ba6aa09c">MutableArrayRef&lt;ResultElem&gt;</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> AVI-&gt;second;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// An immutable pass that tracks lazily created \\c AssumptionCache</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// objects.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This is essentially a workaround for the legacy pass manager&#39;s weaknesses</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// which associates each assumption cache with Function and clears it if the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// function is deleted. The nature of the AssumptionCache is that it is not</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// invalidated by any changes to the function body and so this is sufficient</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// to be conservatively correct.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/assumptioncachetracker"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/assumptioncachetracker/#af6f2b5ca7e621ccfdda6462a700f2865">AssumptionCacheTracker</a> : </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/immutablepass/#a4d664099280bb09275254d64c329d25d">ImmutablePass</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// A callback value handle applied to function objects, which we use to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// delete our cache of intrinsics for a function when it is deleted.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight">FunctionCallbackVH final : </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callbackvh">CallbackVH</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/assumptioncachetracker/#af6f2b5ca7e621ccfdda6462a700f2865">AssumptionCacheTracker</a> &#42;ACT;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callbackvh/#a93891950be05a0bae5743979913e13f3">deleted</a>() </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">override</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Get the cached assumptions for a function.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// If no assumptions are cached, this will scan the function. Otherwise, the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// existing cache will be returned.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/assumptioncache">AssumptionCache</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/assumptioncachetracker/#af0c9a679eca493aa32aa7002bf4a50a3">getAssumptionCache</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Return the cached assumptions for a function if it has already been</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// scanned. Otherwise return nullptr.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/assumptioncache">AssumptionCache</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/assumptioncachetracker/#abd654dc0290a0d3844b2ccba7cc1508d">lookupAssumptionCache</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/assumptioncachetracker/#af6f2b5ca7e621ccfdda6462a700f2865">AssumptionCacheTracker</a>();</span></CodeLine>
